name: The world under home
description:
This is a beta version. I will be glad to hear your opinion. The world is procedurally generated each time. 

In the future, a city with merchants and new dungeons will be added. 

How to Play

Movement: WASD

Interaction with items: E 

Use flask: R

Attack: left mouse button

To open an additional menu in the customizer, click on the flashing arrow

Many thanks to the authors   https://0x72.itch.io/  and https://superdark.itch.io/.
